attributes.action: Ban the sale of 'To Train Up a Child' book as it promotes child abuse
attributes.additional_details:
This book is an abhorrent piece of text that promotes the use of emotional, psychological, and physical violence to 'train' your children into complete submission.
This book should not be sold at all, but especially by Amazon and other websites in the UK.
This page aims to promote the atrocious contents of this book, and hopefully petition the banning of this books sale.
